101084.text: EndpointSlice IP validation now matches Endpoints IP validation.
101084.markdown: EndpointSlice IP validation now matches Endpoints IP validation. ([#101084](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/101084), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Apps and Network]
101084.author: robscott

101093.text: Fixed a bug where startupProbe stopped working after a container's first restart
101093.markdown: Fixed a bug where startupProbe stopped working after a container's first restart ([#101093](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/101093), [@wzshiming](https://github.com/wzshiming)) [SIG Node]
101093.author: wzshiming

101114.text:
We have added a new Priority & Fairness rule that exempts all probes (/readyz, /healthz, /livez) to prevent 
restarting of "healthy" kube-apiserver instance(s) by kubelet.
101114.markdown:
We have added a new Priority & Fairness rule that exempts all probes (/readyz, /healthz, /livez) to prevent 
  restarting of "healthy" kube-apiserver instance(s) by kubelet. ([#101114](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/101114), [@tkashem](https://github.com/tkashem)) [SIG API Machinery]
101114.author: tkashem

99336.text: kubelet: improve the performance when waiting for a synchronization of the node list with the kube-apiserver
99336.markdown: Kubelet: improve the performance when waiting for a synchronization of the node list with the kube-apiserver ([#99336](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/99336), [@neolit123](https://github.com/neolit123)) [SIG Node]
99336.author: neolit123

99839.text: Fixed port-forward memory leak for long-running and heavily used connections.
99839.markdown: Fixed port-forward memory leak for long-running and heavily used connections. ([#99839](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/99839), [@saschagrunert](https://github.com/saschagrunert)) [SIG API Machinery and Node]
99839.author: saschagrunert
